effect.shortEffect: Turns the bearer's normal moves into fairy moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.
effect.full: Turns the bearer's normal-type moves into fairy moves. Moves changed by this ability have 1.3× their power.

description.sun-moon: Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
description.sword-shield: Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
